statements: SELECT * FROM call_records;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_records;
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 300;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number FROM call_records ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_number, AVG(call_duration) as average_duration FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_number LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, caller_number, receiver_number FROM call_records WHERE caller_number LIKE '555%' AND receiver_number LIKE '777%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration FROM call_records WHERE call_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT caller_number, AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 120 ORDER BY call_duration;
SELECT * FROM call_records;
SELECT caller_id, callee_id, call_time FROM call_records WHERE duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT pattern_name, total_calls FROM call_patterns ORDER BY total_calls DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, average_duration FROM call_patterns WHERE total_calls > 100 AND average_duration > 5;
SELECT call_time, duration_seconds FROM call_records ORDER BY call_time ASC, duration_seconds DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE duration_seconds > 60 ORDER BY call_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT caller_id, COUNT(*) FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_id
SELECT pattern_name, average_duration FROM call_patterns ORDER BY average_duration DESC
SELECT pattern_id, total_calls FROM call_patterns WHERE total_calls > 100 ORDER BY total_calls DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT call_id, caller_id, callee_id FROM call_records WHERE call_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY call_time
SELECT * FROM CallRecords;
SELECT caller_id, receiver_id, call_duration FROM CallRecords ORDER BY call_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM CallPatterns WHERE pattern_frequency > 5;
SELECT AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration FROM CallRecords;
SELECT efficiency_date, average_efficiency FROM NetworkEfficiency ORDER BY efficiency_date;
SELECT * FROM CallRecords WHERE caller_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CallRecords WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT call_date, AVG(call_duration) FROM CallRecords GROUP BY call_date;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM CallPatterns WHERE pattern_frequency > 10 ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT efficiency_date, average_efficiency FROM NetworkEfficiency WHERE average_efficiency < 0.5 ORDER BY efficiency_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM call_records ORDER BY call_date DESC;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 10;
SELECT caller_number AS caller, receiver_number AS receiver FROM call_records WHERE call_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration FROM call_records;
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_number, receiver_number;
SELECT * FROM call_records ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT caller_number, receiver_number, call_duration FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 60
SELECT caller_number, AVG(call_duration) AS avg_duration FROM call_records GROUP BY caller_number
SELECT MAX(call_duration) AS max_duration, MIN(call_duration) AS min_duration FROM call_records
SELECT * FROM call_patterns WHERE call_frequency >= 100 ORDER BY average_call_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 60;
SELECT caller_name, caller_location FROM caller_info WHERE caller_id = '100';
SELECT callee_name, callee_phone_number FROM callee_info WHERE callee_location = 'New York';
SELECT pattern_name, call_count FROM call_pattern ORDER BY call_count DESC;
SELECT optimization_date, optimization_details FROM network_optimization WHERE optimization_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM call_records WHERE call_duration > 60 ORDER BY call_timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_id, callee_id, call_duration FROM call_records WHERE caller_id='ABC' AND callee_id='XYZ';
SELECT caller_name, caller_location, caller_phone_number FROM caller_info WHERE caller_location='New York';
SELECT pattern_name, call_count FROM call_pattern ORDER BY call_count DESC;
SELECT optimization_date, optimization_details FROM network_optimization WHERE optimization_date='2022-01-15';
